purpose: Shared utilities and configuration for DocMeta CLI tools, including cross-repo registry management.

registry.js.purpose: Cross-repo reference registry. Parses reference URIs, manages ~/.docmeta registry and cache, exports/imports docmeta bundles, resolves cross-repo consumers.

config.js.purpose: Shared configuration and utilities. Manages history trimming (with ISO 8601 timestamps), .docmeta.json read/write, and project config (.docmetarc.json). Supports DOCMETA_CONFIG env var override.

ignores.js.purpose: Smart ignore patterns combining .gitignore with defaults for dependencies, build output, and secrets.

subagent.js.purpose: DocMeta subagent generator. Creates CLAUDE.md, agent config, and agent instructions with proper scope and ignore patterns.

history: Added JSON output documentation to generated agent
Changed placeholder from _TODO_ to [purpose] to avoid confusion with coding TODOs
Changed from .json to .md agent format; added generateAgentMarkdown function
Updated CLAUDE.md template to use CLI commands instead of Task tool
Fixed CLAUDE.md instructions to use CLI commands instead of non-existent Task tool subagent
Added ISO 8601 timestamps to history entries and DOCMETA_CONFIG env var support
Added cross-repo registry library with DOCMETA_HOME/REGISTRY/CACHE env vars
Added exports and usedBy references for all lib modules
